mapper.select: SELECT back_school_information.back_school_information_id, back_school_information.username, back_school_information.statistics_version_id, back_school_information.area_code, back_school_information.address, back_school_information.back_time, back_school_information.is_healthy, back_school_information.temperature, back_school_information.is_contact, back_school_information.is_leave, back_school_information.leave_reason, back_school_information.is_back_school, back_school_information.state, area.AREA_ID, area.AREA_CODE, area.CITY_CODE, area.AREA_NAME, area.SHORT_NAME, area.LNG, area.LAT, area.SORT, area.GMT_CREATE, area.GMT_MODIFIED, area.MEMO, area.DATA_STATE, city.CITY_ID, city.CITY_CODE, city.CITY_NAME, city.SHORT_NAME, city.PROVINCE_CODE, city.LNG, city.LAT, city.SORT, city.GMT_CREATE, city.GMT_MODIFIED, city.MEMO, city.DATA_STATE, city.TENANT_CODE, province.PROVINCE_ID, province.PROVINCE_CODE, province.PROVINCE_NAME, province.SHORT_NAME, province.LNG, province.LAT, province.SORT, province.GMT_CREATE, province.GMT_MODIFIED, province.MEMO, province.DATA_STATE, province.TENANT_CODE, statistics_version.statistics_version_id, statistics_version.statistics_version_name, statistics_version.ENABLE FROM (((( back_school_information JOIN statistics_version ON statistics_version.statistics_version_id = back_school_information.statistics_version_id ) JOIN area ON back_school_information.area_code = area.AREA_CODE ) JOIN city ON area.CITY_CODE = city.CITY_CODE ) JOIN province ON city.PROVINCE_CODE = province.PROVINCE_CODE ) WHERE username = #{username}
